mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOM ( BOM_ID, PRDT_ID, RWMATR_ID, QY, PRCS_ID, FG, REMK, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{bomId}, #{prdtId}, #{rwmatrId}, #{qy}, #{prcsId}, #{fg}, #{remk}, #{useYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.prdt_id as prdt_id , a.qy as qy, b.nm as nm, b.spec as spec, b.wk_unit as wk_unit, c.vend_name as vend_name, d. prdt_nm as prdt_nm FROM bom a JOIN rwmatr b ON a.rwmatr_id = b.rwmatr_id JOIN vend c ON b.vend_id = c.vend_id JOIN prdt d ON a.prdt_id = d.prdt_id JOIN prdt d ON a.prdt_id = d.prdt_id
